thread.title: UIA expands its domestic route networkTravelandtourworld.com
thread.title_full: UIA expands its domestic route networkTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: UIA expands its domestic route networkTravelandtourworld.com
text:
UIA expands its domestic route network Published on : Thursday, August 20, 2015
UIA will offer up to 7 weekly flights connecting Kiev and Ivano-Frankovsk (PS081/082). The new domestic services will be operated on modern Boeing 737 and Embraer 190 aircraft with two cabin classes – Business Class and Economy Class.
The Kiev – Ivano-Frankovsk flights will be operated daily with scheduled departure from Kiev at 7:35 p.m. and arrival to Ivano-Frankovsk at 8:55 p.m. The Ivano-Frankovsk – Kiev flights will be operated daily as well with scheduled departure from Ivano-Frankovsk at 7:00 a.m. and arrival to Kiev at 8:15 a.m.
“UIA carries on expanding its domestic route network, – noted Evgeniya Satska, UIA Corporate Press Secretary. – Launching non-stop scheduled service to Ivano-Frankovsk, the carrier increases the number of its domestic destinations up to six – Lvov, Kharkov, Odessa, Dnepropetrovsk, Zaporozhye, and Ivano-Frankovsk. Thus, UIA is the only Ukraine`s carrier to offer its passengers vast travel opportunities within the country. We are glad to offer the residents of Western Ukraine an opportunity to take advantage of UIA well-developed route network via Kiev. We are confident travelers from Ukraine and abroad will seize their chance to discover Ivano-Frankovsk and the region in winter”.
UIA flight schedule suits both tourists and business travelers. at Kiev Boryspil International airport UIA offers convenient connections from the cities of Europe, Asia, the US and CIS countries to Ivano-Frankovsk.
Source:- UIA
